entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EE skips static field initialization when scope references collection literals #92615
    9.0.0
  • Configuration provider does not deserialize Dictionary<int, T> correctly. #92609
    Future
  • be consistent about tests for WatchOS #92601
  • [Suggestion] Include msquic along with publish for linux #92598
  • 6.x.x or 7.x.x packages for a .NET 6 application? #92596
  • Follow up to CBOR date handling fix #92595
    9.0.0
  • Sort object properties optimally in emitted config binding gen logic #92594
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Use [RuntimeDirectivesAttribute] to mark RuntimeDirectives Types when use reflection in aot. #92593
  • Simple Blazor Webassmebly project not working in .net8 RC1 #92587
  • JIT: LSRA loses track of anti-preferences #92586
    Future
  • [Maybe a bug] Memory surge when using TaskCompleionSource #92583
    9.0.0
  • SQLite EF Core crashed on AOT #92602
  • Trimmer removes `InternalsVisibleTo` attributes for assemblies which are trimmed #92582
  • Test failure: System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests #92574
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/Multiply/MultiplyLongOps/MultiplyLongOps.cmd #92573
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_91209/Runtime_91209/Runtime_91209.cmd #92572
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/Multiply/MultiplyLongOps/MultiplyLongOps.cmd #92571
    9.0.0
  • Proposal: Add a codegen to update public enum CborTag with IANA CBOR Tags Registry #92567

Closed

  • ILLink analyzer: Action delegate is not handled correctly in the dataflow #84918
  • [Analyzer] Make types declared in an executable internal #78388
    9.0.0
  • CborWriter should use doubling for buffer growth #92425
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_91209/Runtime_91209/Runtime_91209.cmd #92569
  • R2R: Add a CI or perf validation for # of methods jitted #88533
    9.0.0
  • Exception of type 'Interop+AndroidCrypto+SslException' was thrown in .NET MAUI 8.0 preview #89943
    9.0.0
  • Is the `_TEST` section a typo? #92553
    9.0.0
  • StructLayout And MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.ByValArray)Memory layout error when using two attributes simultaneously #92237
  • Set minimum stack size using PT_GNU_STACK header for Musl #72920
    9.0.0
  • Incompatible values of the AssemblyVersion attribute in System.Security.Cryptography.Xml 7.0.1 #92486
  • Upgrading Azure Function v4 from net6 to net7 System.Threading version 7 throws FileNotFoundException #92542
  • WasmStripILAfterAOT results in runtime error #92589
  • Casting very large number as int results in a negative number #92588
  • stackalloc is causing bounds check elimination to break #55777
    Future
  • Array of multidimensional arrays has wrong name #92535
  • [browser] Support structs with JavaScript interop #92198
    Future
  • `ReadsWritesClosedFinish_StreamDisposed` test failures #92350
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi] Fix wasi.build.test instructions #92614
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix test exclusion for Runtime_91209 #92613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port SpinWait(int iterations) to C# #92611
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Ensure HW intrinsics enabled when running arm64 longmul tests. #92607
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update the Windows ARM64 unwinder #92604
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Include info about system call errors in some exceptions from operating on named mutexes #92603
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Add illink analyzer support for field/property initializers #92600
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove Unwrap flag from UniqueComInterfaceMarshaller #92599
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #92579
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Minor code cleanup in TensorPrimitives tests #92575
    area-System.Numerics

Merged

  • Remove slipped debugging message in jitinterface.cpp #92610
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add trim analysis warnings for delegate creation #92427
    area-Meta, linkable-framework
  • Fix Typos #90396
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • CI: Don't run runtime.yml on perf pipeline specific changes #92608
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Reduce System.Data.Odbc build configurations #92570
    area-System.Data.Odbc, needs-area-label
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Update perf-job MonoProduct__ name to match new name #92605
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #92515
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Delete TODO that is not relevant #92597
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve CborWriter buffer growth #92435
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • Fix CFG test helpers defined in TEST section #92581
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Set stack size on MUSL with PT_GNU_STACK header #92465
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce some boilerplate in TensorPrimitive's IBinaryOperator #92576
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add 5 min timeout to VSIX update checks and validate installation state #92516
    area-Infrastructure
  • Clarify MatchAbbreviatedMonthName comment #92405
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Simplify TensorPrimitive's AbsoluteOperator #92577
    area-System.Numerics
  • [QUIC] Improve checking WritesClosed #92580
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][infra] Disable failing apple mobile tests #92108
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Register field seqs for GC pointer constants in side table #92540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 117.0.5938.92, windows: 117.0.5938.92 #92545
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [WIP] Improve `File.Copy` by using the block copy operation for ReFS on Windows #88695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Excessive Encoding in Test Logs #92286
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Switch to etw python script #92508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to Meter and Instruments #91496
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Improve the trim incompatibility message for Assembly.GetType #91876
    area-System.Reflection, linkable-framework
  • Implement StoreVector128x2 for Arm64 #92109
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Convert all remaining tests in the Loader subtree to the merged model #92407
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move TargetsCurrent to net9 and add net8 workload #91480
    area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • Add -skipcrossarchnative and -verbose options #90554
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fixed containment of STOREIND of HW intrinsics ConvertTo* #92513
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve nullability check for generic `.ctor` parameters #92514
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Stop setting separate properties for BUNDLE_PROBE, HOSTPOLICY_EMBEDDED, PINVOKE_OVERRIDE #92448
    area-Host
  • [mono] Unaligned read/write only when NO_UNALIGNED_ACCESS is set #91813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0] [wasm] Endian fix for Webcil #92495
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Tar: Only treat reparse points marked as junctions or symlinks as actual tar symlinks #89102
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement japanese calendar data #92471
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono] Cleanup unused runtime functions #91681
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] dispose runtime #92480
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by array schema #92337
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser][MT] running tests in a "side car" thread #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Reduce 1 possible string allocation in `System.RuntimeType.SplitName` #92558
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by value type schema #92334
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Extend preinitialization interpreter #92470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet publish --no-build` no longer working with `net8.0-macos` target framework #35705
  • `ProjectReference` does not import build.props/build.targets to like `PackageReference` does #35704
  • CheckForDuplicateItems case sensitive #35693
  • [8.0.100-rc.2.23469.4] The type "IPNetWork" exists in both "System.Net.IPNetwork" and "System.Net.Primitives" #35692
  • Installing just ASP.Net Core Runtime Windows Hosting Bundle has different behavior than Dotnet SDK #35691

Closed

  • restore failing on Alpine arm32 #35676

PullRequests

Created

  • Add spelling exclusions file #35716
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Clean up polling file watcher #35712
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add ProjectCapability for Native AOT properties. #35710
    Servicing-consider, Area-WebSDK, 8.0.1xx
  • Make CheckForDuplicateItems case insensitive #35697
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 21.2.0 in /eng/dependabot #35696
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 21.2.0 in /eng/dependabot #35694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • Upgrade MSBuildLocator ref from 1.6.1 to 1.6.10 #35662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2276228 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update RID parsing's `LastIndexOf` call to use invariant culture #35637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0049 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35680
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0002 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35675
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0090 "'new' expression can be simplified" cleanup #35681
    untriaged
  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0017 "Object initialization can be simplified" cleanup #35679
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add explicit dependency on Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.templating for SourceBuild #35440
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sync namespaces doesn't update form namespaces in WinForms project #70123
    17.9
  • Testing out GitHub project behavior #70119
  • EnC: Update names of deleted members to a special name #70117
  • IDE0251 Incorrectly suggests readonly (problem area: inline arrays converting to spans) #70116
  • Pressing `"` should wrap selected text instead of replacing it #70115

Closed

  • Making a virtual interface method abstract then implementing it results in MissingMethodException #70094
    17.8
  • Syntax highlighting of unmanaged calling convention identifiers is not uniform #70107
  • CS1673 false positive #69907
    17.8
  • Nullability warnings are not reported inside collection expressions #69979
  • `GetTypeInfo` returns `TypeInfo` with null as `Type` for `ImplicitObjectCreationExpression` inside `CollectionExpression` #70041
    17.8
  • IDE0028 (Collection initialization can be simplified) results in invalid results with Span targets #70101
  • IDE0078 - Use pattern matching suggests incorrect code when comparing to constants converted with user-defined casts #66787
  • Parameter help and parameter autocompletion are not shown when calling base primary constructor of abstract class #70106
  • VS2022 Sync namespaces from solution explorer also makes other changes. #69884
  • syncing namespaces often isn't worthwhile because the simplifier runs #62948
    Backlog
  • Sync Namespaces is calling some kind of code cleanup #59080
    17.6 P2
  • Roslyn fails to detect null assignments inside 'foreach' #69989
    17.9
  • [Feature Suggestion] Disable execution of specific Roslyn analyzers or code fixes during build and design-time (live analysis) #69733

PullRequests

Created

  • Always respond to the 'cycle through references' command #70126
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update config file #70125
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Snap 17.8 P3 #70124
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not restrict to type argument list context when a name could resolve to a generic and a non-generic symbol #70122
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Document deviations from the C# standard #70121
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Allow only ordinary member method calls to be intercepted #70120
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix 'make member readonly' with inline array fields #70118
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle 32bit Debug desktop in end-to-end test #70114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle constant `null`s in pointer pattern matching #70113
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, untriaged
  • Port accessibility fix for the text view control in lightbulb preview #70112
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • PERF: CompletionService.MergeAndPruneCompletionLists uses SegmentedList for adding/sorting #70111
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix signature-help/completion with primary constructors #70110
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.8 P3
  • Semantic classification of function pointer types #70108
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.8 P3
  • Do not offer to convert AsSpan on lvalues to collection expressions #70102
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.8 P3
  • Use raw strings in regex tests #70098
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.8 P3
  • Fallback gracefully when running on runtimes that only support the Invariant culture #70096
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.8 P3
  • Add a struct enumerator for NodeStateTable<T> #70082
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8 P3
  • Fix order in which flow analysis visits `foreach` #70071
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, 17.8 P3
  • Initialize usage of ProjectDependencyGraph.Empty to start with a null reverseReferencesMap #70036
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.8 P3
  • Use no-op global assembly cache helper when running under .net core #69936
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8 P3

Updated

  • Change completion sorting to use ArrayBuilder instead of SegmentedList #70103
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator #63472
    Area-IDE, Community, Backlog
  • Don't recreate whole completion item upon calculation of properties. #70097
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for collection expressions in attributes #69968
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Add Primary Constructor tests for some scenarios from Test Plan #70056
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • EnC: Parameter and property analysis #69774
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, untriaged, 17.8
  • Implement support in the LSIF generator for logging to stderr #70067
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Check constructor for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: verify element type when reporting conversion error to CollectionBuilder type #69981
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consolidate exception stack trace reporting from analyzers #70031
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.8
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Generate correct state mapping for methods containing await foreach #69806
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Support 'wrapping' for collection expressions. #70060
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add a struct enumerator for WeakList<T> #70075
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: simplify SymbolMatcher #70084
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Avoid `null` type of pattern expression #70055
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve new Blazor project templates. #50927
  • Mvc.Testing.Handlers.RedirectHandler => MaxRedirects does not allow 0 #50925
  • feat: pass custom `ProblemDetailsFactory` in `TypedResult.Problem()` #50924
  • Build time regression for MVC templates #50923
  • Perf regression: fortunes #50922
  • HttpSys tests failing in Helix on Windows #50916
  • Streaming rendering incompatible with certain hosting environments? #50915
    8.0
  • SignalR Client client-to-server streaming is memory leaking in ConnectionState.UploadStreamToken #50913
  • Firefox shows "attempting to reconnect to server" on performing Download operation. #50907
    .NET 9 Planning

Closed

  • Hotreload doesn't work on Blazor wasm (.NET6) #38576
    6.0.x
  • GenerateWatchList fails in .NET 7.0 rc1 #44324
  • Errors CS0115, CS0117 and CS0103 in razor.cs partials and hot reload fails. #47498
  • Hot Reload Support For Blazor #50796
    8.0
  • Perf improvement: single_query, updates #50903
  • Hot reload / dotnet watch not fully working in .NET 8 preview 5 #48796
  • DotNet 8 rc breaks UsePathBase for Blazor Webassembly calling api methods on the server in visual studio #50844
    8.0-rc2
  • UseHttpMethodOverride not working in .NET 8.0 RC1 #50815
    8.0-rc2
  • Reconsider enabling HTTP/3 by default in .NET 8 #50131
    8.0-rc1
  • [Antiforgery] Antiforgery middleware executes too early on the pipeline #50818
    8.0-rc2
  • rc1 tag cross build failed for ppc64le #50679
    8.0-rc2
  • DefaultAntiforgeryStateProvider state persistence doesn't work #50908
    8.0
  • Referencing Blazor WASM project from Server project with Blazor Server breaks hot-reload #44833
  • Auto mode can lead to running Server and WebAssembly in the page at the same time #50686
    8.0-rc2
  • Unable to render a component from a library using the WebAssembly render mode #50609
    8.0-rc2
  • What custom tool that Identity core use for generate `.resx` *.Designer.cs file? #50899
  • Perf regression: fortunes #50898

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete eng/BeforeTargetFrameworkInference.targets #50928
    area-infrastructure
  • Auth with global interactivity #50920
    area-mvc
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50919
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Avoid re-running routing for implicit middlewares and remove implicit anti-forgery #50864
    Servicing-approved, area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Skip failing tests #50917
    area-infrastructure, area-networking, 8.0-rc2
  • [release/8.0] Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2275191 #50906
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, tell-mode
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2275191 #50824
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0-rc2] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    area-blazor
  • Try Adding Support for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Retry stateful reconnect attempts #50745
    area-signalr
  • Update editorconfig with naming rules #50854
    area-infrastructure
  • Avoid excessive WellKnownType cache misses in RDG #50669
    pending-ci-rerun, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Fix blocking call in FindByEmailAsync #50603
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-25

Issues

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Intellisense][Drawing] Add BrushDesignTypeConverter #17636
  • .NET MAUI, Entry Size(Heighr) is Error. #17635
  • .NET MAUI, set Entry style error #17634
  • Will `PointerPressed` be supported as a visual state in .NET 8? #17632
  • Update Border in our templates to have a background set #17631
  • Issue with implicit vs explicit Shell Routing #17629
  • [iOS] Crash in production: .NET ThreadPool Worker EXC_BAD_ACCESS KERN_INVALID_ADDRESS #17626
  • MSAL - PublicClientApplication - GetAccountsAsync() doesn't return any Accounts in windows maui #17623
  • MAUI Slider height property is not setting the height of it #17622
  • Xaml hot reload not working on VS Mac Could not resolve type with token 01000062 from typeref (expected class 'System.AppDomain' #17615
  • "Codesign" exited with code 1 issue when try to build iOS app using visual studio 2022 for mac. #17612

Closed

  • [Windows] Border with rounded corners does not work well #17500
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Border's corner radius applied to child's top left corner in Windows, iOS and MacCatalyst #16444
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Windows] Border content is not correctly clipping and aligning #17109
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Visual Studio 17.7.0 Pre2 / Dotnet 8 8.0.100-preview.5.23303.2 / MAUI 8.0.0-preview.5.8529 build error XAGJS7023 for Android #15947
  • [8.0.100-rc.1.23455.8] dotnet build for windows fails with error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier "win10-x64" is not recognized #17330
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NET Core MAUI_Recipe App_Edit Recipe_Screenreader : The "Review" Label is not announced by Narrator and NVDA Screenreader #15663
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NET Core_MAUI_Recipe App_Your Recipe_Keyboard : The "More options" button is not accessible by keyboard. #15664
    .NET 8 GA
  • Provide Static MauiContextAccessor #16759
    Under Consideration

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Updating a JSON mapped column with a required property causes an exception #31847
  • EntityState is set to Unchanged instead of Modified when assigning a new complex nested property - CosmosDB #31846
  • Inspect the contents of a migration bundle and view generated SQL #31844
  • UTF8 case insensitive like operator in sqlite #31843
  • How can I map a class inheriting from UserControl? #31842
  • "The convention invocations have reached the recursion limit" after running Remove-Migration #31841

Closed

  • In-Memory Database Provider Does Not Respect Filtering with .Where() On .ThenInclude()d Data Sets #31849
  • How to use ExecuteUpdate - from a dictionary with properties and values to be applied #31470
  • Cancelled token does not prevent execution of ExecuteDeleteAsync(token) #31448
    9.0.0
  • dotnet ef migrations bundle ignores --no-build argument #31750
  • Allow collections of FK values in aggregates #31845

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31852
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.10 to 7.0.11 #31848
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • [TEST ONLY] Adding query test suite for optional dependent. #31830
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #31448 Use token for NonQueryResultAsync #31449

Updated

  • Set default discriminator value even when there are no derived types. #31853
